data.title: Rooftop Cinema Club South Beach
data.meta_description: Enjoy the ultimate open-air cinema experience in South Beach Miami with stunning views of the city's skyline!
data.text:
Address: 1212 Lincoln Rd, Miami Beach, FL 33139

Transportation & parking: The cinema is located on the 6th floor of the parking garage at 1212 Lincoln Rd. Guests can self-park on floors 2-5 of the onsite parking garage for $10 after validation (which is provided at the Box Office) for up to 3 hours. Entrance to the parking structure is located off 16th Street. If you are arriving via rideshare, ask to be dropped off at the corner of Alton Road and 16th Street.

Getting to the rooftop: The cinema is located on the 6th floor of the parking garage at 1212 Lincoln Rd. From the ground floor, take the elevator located between SunLife Organics and Dunkin’ off Alton Road. From the garage, take the elevator on the south side (Elevator A, towards 16th Street) of the parking structure – there is no access to the cinema from the elevator on the north side (Elevator C) of the parking garage.

Seating and Layout: We offer two different seating types at this venue: an Adirondack chair for one and a double-width Adirondack Loveseat for two. In addition, all seats in our Premium section include footrests. Please see below for the seating layout. (Click image to view in a separate window)

Tickets: Prices range from $15 – $30, depending on seating section, seat type, ticket inclusions and time of day.

Discounts: Florida residents enjoy 25% off with voucher code: FloridaResident2024. Valid Florida ID required as proof at venue. Active, retired and family of military personnel enjoy 15% off with voucher code: SouthBeachMilitary2024. Any form of valid military ID required as proof at venue. Students enjoy 10% off with voucher code: SouthBeachStudent2024. Active Student ID or Student Schedule required as proof at venue. Please note discount codes are for standard screenings and are not valid for special events.

No Reserved Seating: Guests are seated on a first-come, first-served basis. We always encourage guests to arrive early and all together to ensure they can select their preferred seats.

Age Policy: Unless otherwise noted, screenings starting prior to 7pm are open to teens 13+, but screenings after 7pm are for guests 18+ only. Anyone under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult (18+).

The Great Outdoors: The rooftop is fully exposed to the elements so please check the weather before attending. During daytime screenings you may want to apply sunblock, cover your shoulders and wear a hat, and on cool evenings bring a jacket or your favorite blanket.

Weather disruptions: We make every effort for our screenings to go ahead. However, if inclement weather will affect your movie experience, we’ll cancel the screening and notify you at least one hour prior to the film start time via email with details on how to transfer your tickets to another screening or obtain a refund. You can always check the current status of a screening on its thumbnail visible on the venue page.

Transfers & Refunds: You’re welcome to transfer your tickets to a different screening at any point before your original screening time at no cost. For more information, please check out our Ticket Transfer Instructions page. Refunds are only offered when a screening is canceled.

Cashless operations: We are a cashless business, so please come prepared with your debit or credit card to purchase food and beverage onsite.

No BYO: Outside food or drinks will not be allowed into the venue.

Guest Behavior: We are Social Cinema – talk, laugh, text and snap to your heart’s content, but please be respectful of other guest’s experience, especially once the film begins. Unruly, disruptive or unnecessarily loud guests will be asked to leave.
